data.text:
Weather overview

The city of ZÃ¼rich, nestled in the heart of Switzerland, is known for its temperate and agreeable climate conditions. Throughout the year, inhabitants and visitors alike witness a wide spectrum of temperatures. Typically, at the height of day, temperatures fluctuate from a cool 3Â Â°CÂ (37Â Â°F) in the frigid depths of January, reaching a balmy peak at 24Â Â°CÂ (76Â Â°F) during the sultry month of July. Meanwhile, the nights bring a more consistent range, from the lowest chill of -2Â Â°CÂ (28Â Â°F) in January to the warm embrace of 14Â Â°CÂ (58Â Â°F) at the midsummer night. October stands out as the month with the sparsest rainfall, recording only 11Â days of precipitation, contrasting sharply with June, which tops the chart as the wettest period with 16Â days. One may observe the orchestration of the elements at play, as humidity levels peak during January, with an index of 85Â %.

January weather

In ZÃ¼rich, January sees the year's lowest daytime temperatures, averaging 3Â Â°CÂ (37Â Â°F), coupled with minimal night-time temperatures. The decline in rainfall is also evident, settling at 70Â mmÂ (2.77Â in) for the month. Humidity is at its highest, recorded at 85Â %.

February weather

As the year progresses into February, ZÃ¼rich experiences a decrease in rainy days to 12Â days, along with the lowest annual rainfall. Daytime temperatures begin to climb, reaching 5Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F), while the nights become less cold. The sunrise duration also starts to extend significantly.

March weather

March in ZÃ¼rich is characterized by rising temperatures, now at 10Â Â°CÂ (50Â Â°F) during the day and 2Â Â°CÂ (35Â Â°F) at night. More rainy days are observed, with the tally reaching 13Â days. Rainfall begins to increase again, now registering 78Â mmÂ (3.06Â in). Sunlight without cloud obstruction is more apparent, now showing 4Â hours, and the wind speed peaks at 3.

April weather

In April, night temperatures in ZÃ¼rich continue their ascent, now averaging 5Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F), mirroring the daytime warming trend, which hits 14Â Â°CÂ (57Â Â°F). The increase in sunshine hours is also noticeable, now at 5Â hours. Humidity drops to its lowest of the year, reaching 71Â %.

May weather

May sees a consistent rise in temperatures in ZÃ¼rich, with daytime warmth reaching 19Â Â°CÂ (65Â Â°F) and nighttime temperatures at 9Â Â°CÂ (48Â Â°F). An increase in rainy days is evident, tallying 15Â days, alongside greater rainfall amounts of 116Â mmÂ (4.55Â in). Sunny hours continue to expand, now at 6Â hours.

June weather

June marks the beginning of ZÃ¼rich's tourist season, with day temperatures climbing to 22Â Â°CÂ (71Â Â°F) and nights becoming comfortably warm at 12Â Â°CÂ (54Â Â°F). Maximum rainfall of 126Â mmÂ (4.98Â in) is reached, along with the highest count of rainy days at 16Â days. Ample sunlight is now more prevalent, with the count of sunny hours increasing to 6Â hours.

July weather

The peak of ZÃ¼rich's tourist season corresponds with the highest daytime temperatures, peaking at 24Â Â°CÂ (76Â Â°F), and night temperatures reaching their zenith of 14Â Â°CÂ (58Â Â°F). A downtrend in rainy days begins, decreasing to 15Â days. Sunlight hours crest at 7Â hours.

August weather

As tourist season nears its peak in August, ZÃ¼rich sees a beginning of cooling, with daytime temperatures slightly reducing. Sunlight hours start to decrease, now recording 6Â hours.

September weather

September's climate in ZÃ¼rich indicates a cooling trend, with daytime temperatures dropping to 19Â Â°CÂ (66Â Â°F), and nighttime temperatures beginning their descent, marked at 11Â Â°CÂ (51Â Â°F). A decline in rainy days is recorded, settling at 12Â days, and a decrease in rainfall is noted, now at 97Â mmÂ (3.83Â in). The ongoing tourist season is still perceptible, along with reducing sunlight hours, now totaling 5Â hours.

October weather

October's climate in ZÃ¼rich is marked by the lowest number of rainy days, a mere 11Â days, while rainfall continues to decline, charting 86Â mmÂ (3.37Â in). Day temperatures keep decreasing, now at 14Â Â°CÂ (56Â Â°F), with the night shift also mirroring this decline, at 7Â Â°CÂ (44Â Â°F). An ongoing decrease in sunny hours reflects the change of seasons.

November weather

The chill deepens in November, with night temperatures in ZÃ¼rich descending to 2Â Â°CÂ (35Â Â°F), and daytime temperatures following suit, reported at 7Â Â°CÂ (45Â Â°F). The waning sunny hours continue their downward trend, now marked at 2Â hours.

December weather

December in ZÃ¼rich is characterized by a noticeable decline in daytime temperatures, reaching just 4Â Â°CÂ (39Â Â°F), while nights grow colder still, with an average of -1Â Â°CÂ (30Â Â°F). The onset of increased rainfall is apparent, registering 88Â mmÂ (3.46Â in), and a rise in rainy days commences. Day length hits its annual low point, with a duration of 8Â hours. The least amount of sun, represented by 1Â hour, is also documented.
